__e: So I "pitched her a little woo," as you would've said in your day, and we danced cheek to cheek to those cornball, big-band oldies of yours.
I mean, you know, there's surprise and there there's this-guy- almost-bit my-cheek-off kind of surprise.
He was like you, left cheek always swollen. I used say to him,
We found this in the right cheek of the third victim.
Many people come here... has a scar here on the right cheek.
The beauty mark on your right cheek is the first thing that made me just go crazy for you.
I kiss your cheek and tell you to take care...
Early dinner, tomorrow night, kiss on the cheek good night, and then you go back to your place.
Back when you kissed my cheek, that was the first time in years that I felt another person's touch.
